SELECT R.RECIPE_NO AS RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_NAME, HASHTAG, COOK_INGRE, I_T.IMG_PATH AS IMG_PATH_T, I_R.IMG_PATH AS IMG_PATH_R, I.CODE FROM T4_RECIPE AS R INNER JOIN T4_R_PURPOSE AS P ON R.RECIPE_NO = P.RECIPE_NO INNER JOIN T4_HOWTO AS H ON R.RECIPE_NO = H.RECIPE_NO INNER JOIN T4_INGREDIENT AS I ON R.RECIPE_NO = I.RECIPE_NO INNER JOIN T4_TOOL AS T ON R.RECIPE_NO = T.RECIPE_NO INNER JOIN T4_R_IMAGE AS I_T ON R.RECIPE_NO = I_T.RECIPE_NO INNER JOIN T4_R_IMAGE AS I_R ON R.RECIPE_NO = I_R.RECIPE_NO WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND P.CODE = #{r_purpose} AND H.CODE = #{howto} AND
I.CODE IN
#{item} AND T.CODE = #{tool} AND I_T.THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' AND I_R.THUMBNAIL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY I_R.COOK_INDEX DESC, RAND() LIMIT 1
SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, IMG_PATH FROM T4_MENU WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1

SELECT A.RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_NAME, IMG_PATH AS IMG_PATH_T, IMG_PATH2 AS IMG_PATH_R, CODE, COOK_INGRE FROM T4_RECIPE A LEFT JOIN (SELECT RECIPE_NO, IMG_PATH FROM T4_R_IMAGE WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y') B ON A.RECIPE_NO = B.RECIPE_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT RECIPE_NO, IMG_PATH AS IMG_PATH2 FROM T4_R_IMAGE WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'N') C ON A.RECIPE_NO = C.RECIPE_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT RECIPE_NO, CODE FROM T4_INGREDIENT) D ON A.RECIPE_NO = D.RECIPE_NO WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1

SELECT M.MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, IMG_PATH FROM T4_MENU AS M INNER JOIN T4_PURPOSE AS P ON M.MENU_NO = P.MENU_NO INNER JOIN T4_SITUATION AS S ON M.MENU_NO = S.MENU_NO INNER JOIN T4_NATION AS N ON M.MENU_NO = N.MENU_NO WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND P.CODE = #{purpose} AND S.CODE = #{situation} AND
N.CODE IN
#{item}
ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1

SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_WEIGHT, PRODUCT_EA, PRODUCT_VOLUME, PRODUCT_KIND, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_STOCK, IMG_PATH FROM T4_PRODUCT A LEFT JOIN (SELECT P_IMAGE_NO, PRODUCT_NO, IMG_PATH FROM T4_P_IMAGE WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y') B ON A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO WHERE PRODUCT_KIND != #{code} AND
PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{item},'%')
ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 2
